name: Lalaloopsy™: Carnival of Friends
description: Peanut Big Top™ is throwing the biggest Silly Funhouse carnival in Lalaloopsy Land for all to enjoy, including a special treat at the end! It's up to you to find all of the Lalaloopsy friends at the carnival to reveal the BIG surprise! • See 40 of your favorite Lalaloopsy characters like never before. Plus, unlock a special character in the Nintendo 3DS game!" • For the first time ever play with the Lalaloopsy siblings, the Lalaloopsy Littles! • Explore 16 whimsical levels including the Silly Funhouse Park.
